WorkItem.Description:
As of this morning - worked fine yesterday. Armory itself looks fine on the web but perhaps they have changed something?
Â 
Char is gralin/shadowsong/EU. Error is "index is outside the bounds of the array". Same error from home and work, Rawr b14.1.

Comments.Message:
At least when I looked into the issue - The main wow site is down at the moment.  Your character is on the EU armory yes; however, the base talent spec (before it parses your characters talents) are pulled from there, so it's choking on trying to pull that data.

Unfortunately due to time constraints, that code was never rendered safe like the other armory code against the site being down.  It's on my list of tasks though.

It should be fine when the site comes back up.
